name: Teachings of the Collective of Plenty
title: Iansan: Teachings of the Collective of Plenty
in_play_description: When your Iansan, who has this card equipped, creates a Kinetic Energy Scale, its starting Usage(s) +1.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Iansan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Iansan, equip this card.
After Iansan equips this card, immediately use The Three Principles of Power once.
When your Iansan, who has this card equipped, creates a Kinetic Energy Scale, its starting Usage(s) +1.
(You must have Iansan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
